scroll_list.name: object_list
scroll_list.tool_tip: Double-click an object from this list to inspect it

column.name: object_id
column.label: Attachment Id
column.tool_tip: UUID of the attachment object. Double-click to inspect this object.

column.name: attach
column.label: Attachment point
column.tool_tip: Attachment point for that object. Double-click to inspect this object.

column.name: primitives
column.label: Primitives
column.tool_tip: Number of primitives making of that attachment object. Double-click to inspect this object.

column.name: scripts
column.label: Scripts
column.tool_tip: Number of scripts in the object. Double-click to inspect this object.

button.name: profile
button.label: See avatar profile...
button.tool_tip: See the profile of this avatar.
